law.catch_line: Any person who may be injured by any works of improvement laid out as aforesaid, may apply to the co...
law.text: Any person who may be injured by any works of improvement laid out as aforesaid, may apply to the county commissioners at any time before the approval of the report for an order of review, and the county commissioners may, in their discretion, grant such order and appoint other watershed viewers to perform the same duty as under the original board of watershed viewers.
